name: IsThisACubsGameToday.com
description: Using React-Starter: A minimalist latest version react, react-router, redux and auth plus node static and api server skeleton, an exploration for personal use

scripts.lint: npm run lint-css && npm run lint-js
scripts.build-js: mkdir -p public/js && browserify src/main.js -t babelify --outfile public/js/bundle.js
scripts.build-css: mkdir -p public/css && node-sass --output-style compressed styles/milligram.min.css public/css/main.css
scripts.build: npm run build-js && npm run build-css
scripts.watch: parallelshell 'npm run watch-css' 'npm run watch-js' 'npm start'

author: Mica Alaniz, based on work by Victor Kane
